conbody.p: To log Automation Steps for debugging:

ol.li: Navigate to Setup in Salesforce and use the Quick Find search box to located Custom Settings.

li.p: Click Edit and check the Enable RPA Logging checkbox field.
When finished diagnosing an issue, make sure to uncheck the checkbox. Leaving the box checked will create unnecessary logging records in the org for any Automation Steps that are fired.

ol.li: Recreate the issue where the Automation Step is not firing.
Locate the Web Service Callout Errors Queue report.
Locate the record created when you fired the Automation Step.
Click into the record and locate the Web Service Callout URL.

li.p: Review the contents of the Web Service Callout Body field for information about the request.
When retrieving this information, follow the previous steps to uncheck the Enable RPA Logging on the Conga Orchestrate Settings custom setting.
